name: Urban Assault 2
description:
From the creators of the top selling Race Stunt Fight series comes URBAN ASSAULT II.

Shoot em up, wheelie around em or drive right over therm! Drive down the road shooting at what ever comes your way to gain coins that help you unlock each vehicles true potential! Cars including Mustang, Hummer, Cop, Motorcycles and even just run in your shoes as you zoom through over 40 maps each with new and exciting things to blow up! New bikes, cars and levels!

Each Vehicle has a special weapon, including EMP, Flamethrower and Fireball and all vehicles are unlocked!

Each level has new and exciting objects to blowup including, Chickens, Toxic Barrels, Police Roadblocks.

One button UNLOCKS all weapons and levels!
